mapper.select: SELECT l_no, l_name, l_img, l_cname, lp_poster, num FROM (SELECT l_no, l_name, l_img, l_cname, lp_poster, rownum as num FROM (SELECT l_no, l_name, l_img, l_cname, lp_poster FROM license_1, l_category_1, l_poster_1 WHERE license_1.l_cno = l_category_1.l_cno AND license_1.lp_no=l_poster_1.lp_no ORDER BY l_no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
